titles.title: MP816 Come let us worship Jesus

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, let us worship Jesus,
King of nations, Lord of all.
Magnificent and glorious,
Just and merciful.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lavish our heart's affection,
Deepest love and highest praise.
Voice, race and language blending,
All the world amazed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bring tributes from the nations,
Come in joyful cavalcades.
One thunderous acclamation,
One banner raised.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come, Lord, and fill your temple,
Glorify your dwelling-place,
Till nations see your splendour
And seek your face.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Fear God and give him glory,
For His hour of judgement comes.
Creator, Lord Almighty,
Worship him alone.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, King of the nations,
Jesus, Lord of all.
Jesus, King of the nations,
Lord of all!
